label.name: Name
label.process-false: Switch light off immediately, when "IN" is set to "false".
label.keep-on: Keep light on when "EN" is set to "false".
label.toggle-profile-0-only: "TG" only toggles on an input of "0", other inputs set "SVAL", but don't switch the light off.
label.restore-profile: When the light is switched off (in profile mode) using "TG", restore the last profile after no "IN" for "On time".

presence-light.paletteHelp: This node automatically switches lights on or off depending on presence.
presence-light.input4Description: An input of true sets S to SVAL for On time seconds. false is ignored, except when the Switch light off immediately option is enabled.
presence-light.input5Description: An input of true sets S to SVAL for On time seconds. false resets the timer and immediately sets S to false or 0.
presence-light.input6Description: SVAL (= State value) changes the value, S should output to switch the light. The change is applied immediately, but in contrast to TG, it doesn't switch the light on or off. This can either be true or a profile number greater or equal to 0. 0 is the off profile.
presence-light.input7Description: An input of true sets S to SVAL for On time seconds when it is false. When S is SVAL it is set to false or 0 immediately and the timer is reset. This input also works with profile (scene) numbers. 0 is recognized as the on/off profile toggling the last input scene number greater than 0. Any other number switches to that profile and also sets SVAL.
presence-light.output1Description: Outputs true when the light should switch on and false when it should switch off.
presence-light.output2Description: Outputs true when the always on timer or always off timer reaches 0.
presence-light.output3Description: Outputs the remaining "on time" (in seconds) every second.
presence-light.output4Description: Outputs the remaining "always on time" (in seconds) every second and -1 on reset.
presence-light.output5Description: Outputs the remaining "always off time" (in seconds) every second and -1 on reset.
